Html: I am running CSK 2 on Godaddy hosted environment. Albums display pictures with poor quality. Is there a setting somewhere that I need to change. Any advice would be appreciated. Thanks.
It might be that they are resized. That is just by design. Is the actual photos bad looking while in the album view?

The pictures have sort of a speckled look to them. The actual pictures look good, but when viewing album view they look bad. All of the pictures were 2 - 3 Mb pictures straight from digital camera. I tested uploading a modified picture in MS Picture Manager (Size was about 200 Kb). The 200 Kb picture looks better than the resized 2 - 3 Mb picture. Is there some specific size pictures that should be uploaded for albums? Thanks.
